DOC.brief_title: Early Aerobic Training Program After Ischemic Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study examine feasibility efficacy early supervise aerobic exercise program patient follow minor ischemic stroke . Patients minor ischemic stroke would randomize within 1-3 week stroke onset control group ( 6 week low intensity stretch coordination exercise follow supervised aerobic train program ) experimental group ( immediate aerobic train program ) . Patients evaluate measure ambulation endurance , mobility , gait , functional assessment clinical follow-up 6 week 3 month later .
